HvorMyeForside.Title: How much parental benefit can I get?
HvorMyeForside.Innhold: This guide is for those who want to know approximately how much parental benefit you can get from Nav.
Tittel: How much parental benefit can I get?
ArbeidssituasjonSide.Arbeidssituasjon: What is your current work situation?
ArbeidssituasjonSide.TreSisteMåneder: How much did you earn in the last 3 months?
ArbeidssituasjonSide.GirRett: Which payments entitle you to parental benefit?
ArbeidssituasjonSide.EnAvDisse: If you receive one of these payments from Nav, you may be entitled to parental benefit:
ArbeidssituasjonSide.UtbetaltTreSiste: How much did you receive in the last 3 months, before tax?
ArbeidssituasjonSide.LønnOgUtbetaling: Include both salary and payments from Nav
ArbeidssituasjonSide.SNKanIkkeBruke: As a self-employed person, you cannot use this guide at the moment.
ArbeidssituasjonSide.Lenke: how much you can get as a self-employed person
ArbeidssituasjonSide.OmsorgOgPleie: Care benefit, attendance allowance or training allowance for a sick child
ArbeidssituasjonSide.ValidNumber: You have entered something that is not a number.
OppsummeringSide.GjennomsnittligUtbetali: Average payment with {erDekningsgrad100, select, true {100} other {80}} % parental benefit for {antallUker} weeks {antallDager, select, 0 {} 1 {and {antallDager} day} other {and {antallDager} days}}
OppsummeringSide.Totalt: Total for {erDekningsgrad100, select, true {25} other {30}} weeks before tax
OppsummeringSide.AntallUkerInfo: If the parental benefit period is equally shared between both parents, it will be around {erDekningsgrad100, select, true {25} other {30}} weeks. This is used as an indication of how much parental benefit you can get in total, although you may receive more or less than this.
OppsummeringSide.UtbetaltSomVanlig: Many receive their salary as usual from their employer during the leave
OppsummeringSide.ArbeidsgiverFraNav: If this is the case, your employer will receive parental benefit from Nav and you will receive your salary as normal. You need to contact your employer to learn more about this.
OppsummeringSide.HvaErEs: What is a lump sum grant?
OppsummeringSide.EsSkalBidra: A lump sum grant is meant to help cover some of the expenses associated with having a child. The grant is a one-time payment of {engangsstønad}.
OppsummeringSide.SammenlignFpOgEs: You may want to compare parental benefit and lump sum grant
OppsummeringSide.SammenlignFpOgEsInfoPar: With the income you have stated, you will be entitled to parental benefit. It may still be beneficial in your situation to choose a lump sum grant. Lump sum grant is a one-time payment of {engangsstønad}.
to see the advantages and disadvantages of choosing lump sum grant or parental benefit.
HøyInntektInfobox.DelvisDekning: You are covered up to {maxÅrslønn} of your income
HøyInntektInfobox.OppgittHøyereInntekt: You have reported an income higher than this, but this is not covered by Nav.
HøyInntektInfobox.HøyereLenke2: the basic amount in the National Insurance Scheme (open in new tab).
HarIkkeRettTilFpInfobox.IkkeRett: With an annual income below {minÅrslønn}, you are not entitled to parental benefit
HarIkkeRettTilFpInfobox.AntattLønn: Based on what you have reported, we assume you have an annual income of {antattÅrslønn} per year. To be entitled to parental benefit, you must earn at least {minÅrslønn} per year.
HarIkkeRettTilFpInfobox.Lenke1: You may be entitled to a lump sum grant instead. You can use
HarIkkeRettTilFpInfobox.Lenke2: Nav's guide for lump sum grant or parental benefit (open in new tab)
HvorMyeForside.UsikkerFp: Unsure if you are entitled to parental benefit?
HvorMyeForside.PrøvVeiviser: Try our guide “Parental benefit or lump sum grant?”
ArbeidssituasjonSide.FpEllerEs: Parental benefit or lump sum grant?
